AuthorName.Content: Twitter] ;LinkedIn] Facebook] R Paramitha, Y Feng, F Massacci - arXiv preprint arXiv:2506.11939, 2025Vulnerability datasets used for ML testing implicitly contain retrospective information. When tested on the field, one can only use the labels available at the time of training and testing (eg seen and assumed negatives). As vulnerabilities are discovered across calendar time, labels change and past performance is not necessarily aligned with future performance. AuthorName.Content: Twitter] ;LinkedIn] Facebook] DR de Lima Cabral, P Antonino, ACA Sampaio - Journal of Cloud Computing, 2025The Ethereum blockchain has a gas system that associates operations with a cost in gas units. Two central concepts of this system are the gas limit assigned by the issuer of a transaction and the gas used by a transaction. The former is a budget that must not be exhausted before the completion of the transaction execution; otherwise, the execution fails.
